node.name: PLEASE_ENTER_YOUR_USERNAME_AND_PASSWORD
node.value: Please enter your usename and password

node.name: IF_YOU_DONT_HAVE_AN_ACCOUNT
node.value: if you don't have an account!.

node.name: LOGIN_WAS_UNSUCCESSFUL_PLEASE_CORRECT_THE_ERRORS_AND_TRY_AGAIN
node.value: Login was unsuccessful. Please check the error and try again.

node.name: USERNAME_ALREADY_EXISTS._PLEASE_ENTER_A_DIFFERENT_USER_NAME.
node.value: Username already exists. Please enter a different username.

node.name: THE_USER_NAME_OR_PASSWORD_PROVIDED_IS_INCORRECT
node.value: Username or password provided is incorrect.

node.name: YOUR_ACCOUNT_IS_NOT_ACTIVE!_PLEASE_CHECK_EMAIL_TO_ACTIVE_ACCOUNT
node.value: Your account is not active! Please check the email to active the account

node.name: YOUR_ACCOUNT_IS_DISABLED_BY_MONEY_PACIFIC_ADMIN
node.value: Your account is disabled by Money Pacific Admin!

node.name: THE_CURRENT_PASSWORD_IS_INCORRECT_OR_THE_NEW_PASSWORD_IS_INVALID
node.value: The current password is incorrect or the new password is invalid.

node.name: ACCOUNT_IS_ACTIVE_NOW!_CLICK_TO_LOGIN
node.value: Account is active now. Please click Login to access your account.

node.name: PASSWORDS_ARE_REQUIRED_TO_BE_A_MINIMUM_OF
node.value: Passwords are required to be a minimum of

node.name: ACCOUNT_CREATION_WAS_UNSUCCESSFUL._PLEASE_CORRECT_THE_ERRORS_AND_TRY_AGAIN
node.value: Account creation was unsucessful. Please correct the errors and try again.

node.name: NEW_PASSWORDS_ARE_REQUIRED_TO_BE_A_MINIMUM_OF
node.value: New passwords are required to be a minimun of

node.name: PASSWORD_CHANGE_WAS_UNSUCCESSFUL._PLEASE_CORRECT_THE_ERRORS_AND_TRY_AGAIN
node.value: Password change was unsucessful. Please correct the errors and try again.

node.name: YOUR_PASSWORD_HAS_BEEN_CHANGED_SUCCESSFULLY
node.value: Your password has been changed sucessfully

node.name: TO_RECOVERY_YOUR_PASSWORD,PLEASE_ENTER_YOUR_USERNAME_OR_THE_EMAIL_TO_RECOVERY_YOUR_PASSWORD.THE_LINK_WILL_BE_SENT_TO_YOU_BY_EMAIL_TO_GENERATE_THE_PASSWORD
node.value: To recovery your password,please enter your username or the email to recovery your password. The link will be sent to you by email to generate the password

node.name: MANAGE_YOUR_PROFILE_FROM_THIS_PAGE
node.value: Manage your profile from this page

node.name: YOU_REQUEST_TO_RECOVERY_THE_PASSWORD_SUCCESSFULLY._PLEASE_CHECK_YOUR_EMAIL_TO_GET_THE_LINK_FOR_GENERATE_THE_PASSWORD
node.value: You request to recovery the password successfully. Please check your email to get the link for generate the password.

node.name: PLEASE_CHECK_EMAIL_TO_ACTIVE_ACCOUNT
node.value: Please check email to active account!

node.name: YOU_MUST_SELECT_THIS_CHECK_BOX_ONLY_IF_THE_PRODUCT_YOU_WILL_SELL_IS_NOT_DELIVERED_BY_MAIL._DOWNLOAD_PRODUCT:_MUSIC,_SOFTWARE,_ACCESS_CODE
node.value: You must select this check box ONLY if the product you will sell is not delivered by mail. Download product: Music, software, access code,...

node.name: YOU_CAN_ALSO_SELECT_THIS_CHECK_BOX_IF_YOU_DON’T_WANT_MONEY_PACIFIC_HELP_YOU_TO_MANAGE_THE_DELIVERY_(EXPERT_MODE)
node.value: You can also select this check box if you don’t want Money Pacific help you to manage the delivery (expert mode).

node.name: ENTER_MONEY_PACIFIC_CODE(LIMIT_5_CODES)
node.value: Enter Money Pacific Code( Limit 5 codes)

node.name: PAYMENT_IS_SUCCESSFULLY._SYSTEM_IS_REDIRECTING_IN_5_SECONDS...
node.value: Payment is successly. System is redirecting in 5 seconds...

node.name: THE_FOLLOW_ORDER_IS_CLOSED_SUCCESSFULLY
node.value: The follow order is closed sucessfuly.

node.name: THE_PROOF_OF_THE_ORDER_IS_VALIDATED_AND_THE_MONEY_NOW_IS_AVAILABLE_FOR_WEBMASTER.NOW_YOU_CAN_CLOSE_THE_FOLLOW_ORDER
node.value: The proof of the order is validated and the money now is available for webmaster. Now you can close the follow order

node.name: MONEY_PACIFIC_DONT_VALIDATE_THE_PROOF_OF_ORDER_THAT_WEBMASTER_SENT_TO_US.YOUR_TRANSACTION_IS_NOT_SUCCESSFUL_AND_WE_WILL_GENARATE_A_NEW_PACIFIC_CODE_FOR_THE_CUSTOMER
node.value: Money pacific dont validate the proof of order that webmaster sent to us. Your transaction is not successful and we will genarate a new pacific code for the customer.

node.name: THIS_FOLLOW_IS_CLOSED_BY_MONEY_PACIFIC_ADMIN
node.value: The follow is closed by Money Pacific Admin!

node.name: FOR_MORE_INFORMATION,PLEASE_USE_PACIFIC_MESSENGER_TO_DISSCUS_WITH_WEBSITE_ADMIN
node.value: For more information, please use pacific messenger to disscus with website admin

node.name: SORRY!TIME_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_REPORT.YOUR_ORDER_MAYBE_ON_THE_WAY_TO_DELEVERY
node.value: Sorry! Time not available for report. Your order is maybe on the way to delevery.

node.name: TO_VIEW_THE_MONEY_OVERVIEW,_YOU_MUST_SET_THE_PAYMENT_IN_THE_SETTING_MENU
node.value: To view the money overview, you must Set Payment in the Setting Menu

node.name: YOU_HAVE_JUST_SET_WITHDRAW_MONEY_SUCCESSFULLY
node.value: You have just set Withdraw money successfully.

node.name: YOUR WEBSITE_IS_ADDED_SUCCESSFULLY!_WE_WILL_REVIEW_YOUR_WEBSITE_AND_VALIDATE_IN_24_HOURS
node.value: Your website is added successfully! We will review your website and validate in 24 hours

node.name: THIS_NAME_IS_JUST_FOR_YOU,_TO_REMEMBER_WHAT_THIS_BUTTON_FOR
node.value: This name is just for you, to remember what this button for.

node.name: INDICATE_HERE_THE_VALUE_OF_THE_BUTTON
node.value: Indicate here the value of the button

node.name: RETURN_URL_SUCCESS_TEXT
node.value: We use this URL if transaction if successful

node.name: RETURN_URL_FAIL_TEXT
node.value: We use this URL if transaction fail

node.name: JUST_SELECT_WHAT_DISPLAY_YOU_PREFER_FOR_THE_MONEY_PACIFIC_BUTTON_IN_YOUR_WEBSITE
node.value: Just select what display you prefer for the Money Pacific button in your website

node.name: SELECT_THE_LANGUAGE_TO_USE_FOR_DEFAULT
node.value: Select the language to use for default

node.name: IN_THIS_PAGE_YOUR_CAN_EASILY_ADD_AND_EDIT_ALL_YOUR_WEBSITE_TO_USE_MONEY_PACIFIC_PAYMENT_SOLUTION
node.value: In this page your can easily add and edit all your website to use Money Pacific Payment solution.

node.name: DO_IT_NOW_:_YOU_JUST_NEED_5_MINUTES_TO_ADD_A_NEW_WEB_SITE
node.value: Do it now : You just need 5 minutes to add a new web site !!!

node.name: THIS_PACIFIC_CODE_IS_USED_TO_MAKE_TEST
node.value: This Pacific Code is used to make test

node.name: JUST_SELECT_YOUR_WEBSITE_AND_WE_WILL_GENERATE_A_NEW_SCRIPT_READY_TO_USE_FOR_YOUR_WEBSITE.
node.value: Just select your website and we will generate a new script ready to use for your website.

node.name: YOU_CAN_CREATE_AS_MANY_SCRIPTS_AS_YOU_WANT_FOR_EACH_WEB_SITE.
node.value: You can create as many scripts as you want for each web site.

node.name: IF_YOU_DONT_SEE_ANY_WEBSITE_IN_THIS_SECTION_YOU_MUST_GO_FIRST_IN_THE_MENU_WEBSITE/ADD_AND_EDIT
node.value: If you don’t see any website in this section you must go first in the menu 'website/ add and edit'

node.name: AND_JUST_CUT_AND_PASTE_THIS_SCRIPT_IN_YOUR_WEBSITE_TO_THE_PLACE_YOU_WANT_THE_BUTTON
node.value: And just cut and paste this crypt in your website to the place you want the button.

node.name: THIS_IS_THE_PAYOUT_AND_EARNING_DETAILS_PAGE
node.value: This is the payout and earning details page

node.name: HeaderText1
node.value: YES, YOU CAN NOW BUY ON INTERNET WITH CASH !!!

node.name: HeaderText2
node.value: NO CARD | NO ACCOUNT | NO ENROLMENT | 100% SECURE
